channel.title: I wonder..
channel.description:
What do you think games would be like if Half Life was never invented, if the source engine never came?
It seems as though Valve are very respected for there source engine and was wondering what kinda games/gameplay we would be stuck with if Valve never was around.
I was also wondering if they inspired other game developers to go further?

item.title: I wonder..
item.dc:creator: Nathan
item.description:
Just came into my mind

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder..
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
but it’s here after all, why should we think about “what if…without HL”.

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder..
item.dc:creator: Nathan
item.description:
Yeah, it would be bad. I feared this.

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder..
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Then Doom 3 would’ve been the leading example.

And gaming would suck. Immensely.

Read full topic
